thread.title: Student leader says talks with Zuma were productive
thread.title_full: Student leader says talks with Zuma were productive | News24

author: news24.com
title: Student leader says talks with Zuma were productive
text:
Durban - University of KwaZulu-Natal Student Representative Council president Dithobe Mosana , who was part of the meeting with President Jacob Zuma on Friday, said he was pleased with negotiations.
"We went into the meeting at about 11:30. We appreciate that the president took the time to listen to what we had to say."
Mosana said the meeting included vice chancellors, chairs of councils and SRC leaders.
"During the meeting we all agreed that there should be a 0% increase and that the government would assist... with funding. It was also agreed that the universities would cut costs where they can."
